backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister providing user profiles, auth checks, and CRUD operations for movies with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports linking features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files and components for reference.
frontend/docs/publishing.md: Guide explaining how to publish Draft to Live in Caffeine and troubleshoot backend or authentication issues.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables and theming, including light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app with Russian metadata and PWA-related tags.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata including icons, colors, names, and start URL.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first caching, offline fallback for navigation, and cache version management.
frontend/QA-delete-button-ownership.md: Manual QA checklist verifying correct Delete-button visibility based on movie ownership and authentication state.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers, handles service worker registration, backend availability checks, and renders the main layout with header, movie grid, footer, and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AddMovieDialog.t: Provides a modal for authenticated users to add movies with genres and photo uploads, including validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Handles login/logout with Internet Identity and clears cached data on logout, showing appropriate UI state.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Displays a full‑screen error with retry and reload options when the backend is unreachable.
Autoplays looping background music with mute/unmute control and fallback for autoplay restrictions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the retro‑styled footer with credits and access to publishing and installation help dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the title, genre selector, auth controls, and add‑movie button while reporting backend‑loading issues.
frontend/src/components/InstallHelpDialo: Provides a dialog explaining how to install the PWA on Android and iOS devices.
frontend/src/components/MovieCard.tsx: Displays a movie card with photo carousel, ownership-based delete option, and click-to-open detail handling.
frontend/src/components/MovieDetailDialo: Shows a dialog with full movie details and a photo viewer supporting navigation and thumbnail selection.
frontend/src/components/MovieGrid.tsx: Fetches and displays movies in a grid with pagination, genre filtering, error handling, and detail dialog integration.
frontend/src/components/PaginationContro: Renders numbered pagination buttons with ellipsis logic and triggers page changes.
frontend/src/components/PublishingHelpDi: Provides a help dialog explaining how to publish an app and troubleshoot common backend issues.
frontend/src/components/VHSEffects.tsx: Renders retro VHS-style visual effects using canvas plus layered background overlays.
frontend/src/context/BackendAvailability: Provides context for backend availability state, handling health checks, errors, and retry logic with query refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend health using the actor, exposing health status and retry behavior with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login/logout actions, and login state through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend movie-related queries with actor readiness and backend availability checks, reporting unavailability errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and an 80s neon theme with custom CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing query client and Internet Identity context to the component tree.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend and actor errors into user-friendly messages and detects backend-unavailable error types.
frontend/src/utils/movieOwnership.ts: Provides a helper to check whether the current identity matches a movie’s creator.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from either session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, layout settings, extensions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and known deployment issues for the app recovery and health‑check work.
